column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I had forgotten just how wonderful this museum is until I went back yesterday.  The Art Institute has a truly incredibly diverse collection
column5: and just about anything else you could want to see.  You can still suggest an admission price until early June
column7: so there is absolutely no reason not to spend a day here (or two
column8: or three . . .).  Sadly the Chagall windows are not on view anymore (they're being restored for the next FOUR YEARS) but there are still thousands of reasons to visit the AIC.
